ocean.question: I wave but have no hands. Fish live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm big and blue!
⛵ Boats sail on me.
🐠 Many animals call me home.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a gastropod.
🏠 I carry my home with me.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.

ocean.explanation: While snails can be found in the ocean, the answer should be a sea snail.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🦈 Some kinds of me have to keep swimming to breathe.
🛥️ Divers use a cage when I'm nearby.

ocean.question: I'm a very smart sea animal that makes clicking sounds. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I love to jump out of the water.
🗣️ I use echolocation to find things.
🏥 I can help injured swimmers

ocean.question: I'm a creature with eight arms and I can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I live in the ocean.
✨ Some types of me can change color.
🧱 I am an invertebrate that can squeeze through small spaces.

ocean.question: I am a colorful star that lives underwater. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms.
🖐️ I can grow a new arm if I lose one.
🌈 I come in many different colors!

ocean.question: I'm a slow-moving sea creature that looks like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I am a type of fish.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 The daddy carries the babies.
🌿 I blend in with the seaweed.

ocean.question: I am a large sea animal with a shell and I lay my eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I swim in the ocean.
🏖️ I come onto land to lay my eggs.
🌱 I eat plants and jellyfish.

ocean.question: I live in a shell, but I'm not a snail. I'm often found on the beach, and sometimes you can hear the ocean when you hold me to your ear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I am a type of mollusk.
🌊 I use a muscular foot to dig in the sand.
🍔 Sea otters like to use me as a tool.

ocean.question: I'm a long, thin fish that hides in the sand and can deliver an electric shock. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I have special organs to create electricity.
🐍 I look like a snake but am actually a fish.
🏖️ I can be found buried in the sand on the ocean floor.

ocean.explanation: Electric eels are found in freshwater, so the answer must be an electric ray.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I help flowers make honey.
🐝 I say 'Bzzz'!
🍯 I make something sweet.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round.
🍀 People think I am lucky.
⚫ I have spots on my back.

bug.question: I wiggle and crawl, then spin a cozy bed. After that, I have wings instead. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves.
🦋 I change a lot.
🌱 I turn into something beautiful.

bug.question: I live in the ground and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I often work together with many friends.
🏠 I live underground.
💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I jump very high and love to eat plants. I am usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🦗 I make a chirping sound.
🟢 I am often the same color as grass.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🪰 Flies are my favorite snack.

bug.question: I am a beetle that flashes light at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up the night sky.
🔦 I make my own light!
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I’m a noisy bug that sings in the summer. You can often find me in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Only the male sings!
🌳 I spend most of my life underground.
🔊 I make a loud buzzing noise.

bug.question: I look like a stick and blend in with the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very long and thin.
🍃 I am good at hiding.
🦯 I look like part of a tree branch.

bug.question: I am a long, thin bug with many legs. If you touch me, I curl into a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I live in damp places.
⚽ I can roll up tightly.
🛡️ I have a segmented body.
